In terms of implementation, what exactly is the â€˜?â€™ operator? Does it get expanded to the match error and return statement? If I want to learn more, where/how should I start? Appreciate any leads, thank you! ðŸ˜ƒ

PS: total newb here.
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/d890e64dff3fd2c28635c60cc9315648dd46c8f7/compiler/rustc_ast_lowering/src/expr.rs#L1476 is the code that does the desugaring

You can also read about it in the "Detailed Design" section (today would be "Reference-level explanation") of the RFC: https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/blob/master/text/1859-try-trait.md#desugaring-and-the-try-trait

What are you hoping to do with the knowledge?
